channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Russia to begin work on CBDC settlement system in Q1 as sanctions endure: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The country’s central bank will begin studying two possible cross-border CBDC settlement models this quarter.

item.title: Layer-1 EVM oracle platform Flare launches to boost interoperable DApps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Layer 1 EVM blockchain Flare goes online, aimed at providing developers a platform to build decentralized interoperability applications.

item.title: NY law firm investigates potential 'securities fraud' at Core Scientific
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The investigation was prompted by a report from Culper Research, which alleged that Core Scientific had "wildly oversold" its mining and hosting businesses.

item.title: Bitcoin derivatives data suggests a BTC price pump above $18K won’t be easy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The BTC futures premium remains a topic of concern, but it appears that traders are starting to price similar risks for the upside and downside.

item.title: CFTC files suit against Avraham Eisenberg for market manipulation in Mango exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Eisenberg claimed his actions on the DeFi platform were legal and negotiated a “white hat” bug bounty after making off with over $100 million; the government is unconvinced.

item.title: BlockFi plans to file assets and liabilities for bankruptcy case on Jan. 11
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The company claimed that no members of the BlockFi management team had withdrawn any crypto from the platform since October.

item.title: Bitcoin mining stocks surge with broader market as traders see less aggressive Fed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: The BTC price rose to three-week highs ahead of a highly anticipated U.S. CPI report later this week.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price is up today after the stock market’s start-of-year rally continued and as investors hope this week’s CPI report will show a reduction in inflation.

item.title: SBF claims himself not guilty, faces up to 115 years in jail: Law Decoded, Jan. 2-9
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.category: the controversial lawyer who served as top compliance chief at FTX
item.description: The entrepreneur faces eight criminal counts, which could result in 115 years in prison should he be convicted.

item.title: Voyager tells court Binance acquisition plan is ‘sound business judgment,’ urgently needed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The bankrupt brokerage answered objections from a host of interested parties, claiming its information disclosures are adequate and so is its decision-making.

item.title: Price analysis 1/9: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: DXY is cooling off and crypto and equities are starting to heat up. Cointelegraph explores how BTC and altcoins could react to the current bullish momentum in the market.

item.title: The ‘Elon effect’ shows how opinion leaders shape the fintech market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vladimir Gorbunov
item.description: Crypto “influencers” wield considerable influence over markets, particularly cryptocurrency markets — which hasn’t been positive for everyone over the last two years.

item.title: Former CCP official apologies for ‘grave losses’ as a result of supporting crypto miner: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Former Chinese Communist Party member Xiao Yi seemed to speak with a very subdued voice from what appeared to be prison, apologizing for supporting a Fuzhou crypto mining firm.

item.title: How to keep your crypto safe in 2023: A few tips from an analyst
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: James Check, the Lead on-chain analyst at Glassnode, explains why self-custodying your private keys has become more important than ever and how to do it in a few simple steps.

item.title: 5 cryptocurrencies that could benefit from a positive CPI report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Crypto markets flip green following the continuation of last week’s rally in equities, and SOL, XMR, LDO and AAVE could be ready to move higher.

item.title: Huobi Korea seeks to split from parent company, change its name: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Chairman Cho Kook-bong will also take over a majority of shares previously held by co-founder Leon Li.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Ethereum's price is up today, with most options traders anticipating a run toward $3,500 to $4,000 before April 2023.

item.title: Crypto-asset manager Osprey Funds lays off most of its staff: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Institutional demand for Bitcoin and other crypto assets has waned due to the bear market.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: The crypto market is up today, reflecting market participants’ expectations that inflation is cooling ahead of U.S. CPI data.

item.title: Belgian MP receives Bitcoin salary for a year: Here’s what he learned
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Christophe De Beukelaer considers his experiment successful, as he raised awareness among the local lawmakers.

item.title: Crypto layoffs mount as exchanges continue to be ravaged by the prevailing bear market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: Many popular cryptocurrency trading platforms, including Kraken and Coinbase, have recently initiated a fresh round of firings.

item.title: US DOJ announces seizure of 55M Robinhood shares
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Justice Department said it had seized 55,273,469 shares of Robinhood and more than $20 million in U.S. currency as part of the criminal case against Sam Bankman-Fried.

item.title: New York-based bank exits crypto after tumultuous year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Metropolitan Bank Holding Corp, the holding company for Metropolitan Commercial Bank, says it’s completely exiting its crypto-asset-related vertical.

item.title: German regulator warns of new banking and crypto malware ‘Godfather’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The “Godfather” malware is also known to target 110 cryptocurrency exchange platforms and 94 cryptocurrency wallet apps.

item.title: What is the Trust Wallet and how do you use it?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Deer
item.description: Trust Wallet is a secure noncustodial cryptocurrency wallet that supports multiple blockchains.

item.title: Crypto billionaires’ back-to-back deaths spark wild theories among the community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Many blamed the deaths on the billionaires’ past, while others suspected some form of foul play and even execution.

item.title: Hong Kong wants to become crypto hub despite industry crisis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Hong Kong is doing its best to provide an appropriate amount of supervision to the crypto market in order to release the potential of technologies like Web3.

item.title: Nomad exploit wallet address transfers $1.5M to Tornado Cash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The wallet address related to the $190 million hack transferred more than 1200 Ether to the sanctioned cryptocurrency mixer Tornado Cash.

item.title: Less than 100 Bitcoin ATMs added worldwide in the second half of 2022: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Over the last six months, between July to the end of 2022, just 94 Bitcoin ATMs were added to the global network.

item.title: BTC price 3-week highs greet US CPI — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin charges above the $17,000 mark but misgivings remain among traders ahead of CPI, Fed comments and amid a brewing storm at Digital Currency Group.
